meanings.definition: A person who cooperates with others.
meanings.sent1: The kindergartener was a great cooperators during playtime.
meanings.sent2: The team of scientists were excellent cooperators on the research project.
meanings.sent3: The cooperators in the cooking class made a delicious meal together.
meanings.sent4: The ants were like cooperators, working together to build their nest.
meanings.sent5: The students were shining examples of cooperators in the school play.

meanings.definition: A group of people or organizations that work together for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The cooperators in the charity organization raised funds for the community.
meanings.sent2: The cooperators in the company collaborated to launch a new product.
meanings.sent3: The cooperators at the picnic ensured everyone had enough food to eat.
meanings.sent4: The countries acted as cooperators to address the global issue.
meanings.sent5: The cooperators in the orchestra played harmoniously during the concert.
